aboutSamaj.title: About the Samaj
aboutSamaj.tagline: Rooted in Jain values, our community stands for compassion, service, and harmony.
aboutSamaj.description: Rooted in the timeless teachings of Jain philosophy, our Samaj stands as a symbol of compassion, harmony, and service. Through collective effort, we nurture unity, preserve our traditions, and guide future generations toward a path of peace.

banner.alt: Community banner representing unity and Jain values
